main event: On July 4, 1960, three distinct circular objects were observed moving rapidly across the sky in a V-shaped formation over Brookville, Long Island, New York.
interesting points: The observers described the objects as having a pearly, glistening reflection and being larger than car headlights,The sighting lasted for approximately 1 1/2 minutes,One object changed course while the other two maintained their trajectory,The weather conditions were clear with no wind at the ground level,The objects were estimated to be at a significant altitude.
sighted object: three circular objects in a V-shaped formation
witness description: The witnesses include a husband, wife, and neighbor who observed the sighting together.
